text:
@realDonaldTrump @JayInslee Joe doesn’t need to leave his home bc he is kicking your ugly, orange, racist arse in the polls.
Go ahead & hold your hate rallies, put your sycophants lives at risk of being infected with #COVID19 & possibly dying.
